data.eml:eml: Dialeurolonga re-defined (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae): with a new genus and species from India, two new genera from Australia, and discussion of host-correlated puparial variation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dubey, Anil Kumar (2013): Dialeurolonga re-defined (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae): with a new genus and species from India, two new genera from Australia, and discussion of host-correlated puparial variation. Zootaxa 3616 (6): 548-562, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.6.2
